I would say to my colleague, I very much wish that I was not in this  position. This morning, I was--like Chairman Lee, I was chairman of the  committee, and I know this is a challenging process to put these  measures together.

Chairman Lee and I have worked very closely for years on these issues  and a host of others, and I look…

Mr. NUNN of Iowa. Mr. Speaker, I thank Chairwoman Foxx for the  incredible work of the Rules Committee. I know we worked through the  night on something that is very important. That is ethanol--E15, to be  specific.

Mr. Speaker, I rise today on behalf of the farmers, families,…
